pkgmetadata.longdescription: This library was renamed due to a naming conflict with an official python library. Please use the new listing at https://pypi.org/project/segment-analytics-python/Segment is the simplest way to integrate analytics into your application.One API allows you to turn on any other analytics service. No more learningnew APIs, repeated code, and wasted development time.This is the official python client that wraps the Segment REST API (https://segment.com).Documentation and more details at https://github.com/segmentio/analytics-python
